XXajitsvyu:221: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenam evam āha |

XXajitsvyu:223: atha rājā ajitasenas taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:227: yadi te bhikṣo mama svamāṃsena kāryaṃ svamāṃsaṃ dāsyāmi |
XXajitsvyu:228: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata |
XXajitsvyu:230: bhuṃjāmi tad bhojanu yad dadāhi mṛṣṭānnapānaṃ rasapānam uttamam* /
XXajitsvyu:231: kleśā hi nirmukta tvayā bhaviṣyasi sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābham* //
XXajitsvyu:232: sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakasya śraddhāprasādaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham* /
XXajitsvyu:233: ye śāsane pra[vra]jitā ca bhikṣavā sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakānām* //
XXajitsvyu:234: sudurlabhaṃ sugatavarasya darśanaṃ namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvo /
XXajitsvyu:241: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇam udīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:242: atha rājānam ajitasenaṃ taṃ nandimitro mahāśrāvako gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata |
XXajitsvyu:243: sudurlabhaṃ bhikṣu tathaiva darśanaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya bhaveya darśanam* /
XXajitsvyu:245: ye bhikṣusaṃghasya dadeya dānaṃ na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāś ca //
XXajitsvyu:248: ye bhikṣusaṃghāya dadanti dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya manuṣyalābham* //
XXajitsvyu:249: yo durlabhaṃ darśanu bhikṣubhāvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ kalpaśatair acintiyaiḥ /
XXajitsvyu:250: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhāraye kalpāna koṭīnayutān acintiyā //
XXajitsvyu:251: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam* /
XXajitsvyu:252: na tasya bhotī vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam* //
XXajitsvyu:255: yo dāsyate asya hi piṇḍapātaṃ muktā na bheṣyaṃti jarārtavyādhayā //
XXajitsvyu:256: kleśā vinirmukta sadā tu bheṣyati te tasya dāsyantiha piṇḍapātam* //
XXajitsvyu:257: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇam udīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt*
XXajitsvyu:258: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako (Asv 119) rājānam ajitasenam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:259: evam astu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapātaṃ tava gṛhe |
XXajitsvyu:260: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma |
XXajitsvyu:261: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:262: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmir asti |
XXajitsvyu:264: asti mahāśrāvaka udyānabhūmir mama ramaṇīyā suśobhanā |
XXajitsvyu:273: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇās te sarve santīti |
XXajitsvyu:274: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyas tāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyas tā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ
XXajitsvyu:275: tāś ca puṣkariṇyaḥ suvarṇasopānasaṃcchannā divyā ramaṇīyāḥ |
XXajitsvyu:276: ye ca jāṃbūpakaparibhogaguṇās te sarve santīti |
XXajitsvyu:278: (Asv 120) ye tiryagyonigatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśārikācakravākamayūrakokilādayas te nānārutāni kurvanti sma |
XXajitsvyu:279: atha tatraiva udyānabhūmau suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣiṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ |
XXajitsvyu:283: atha rājā ajitasenas taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:288: atha nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ rājā ajitaseno gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata |
XXajitsvyu:290: aśokamucilinda tathaiva pāṭalā saugandhikāś ca sumanā ca vārṣikā //
XXajitsvyu:291: tadā pāriyātrā nadītīranirmitā suvarṇavarṇā sada pakṣiṇā abhūt* /
XXajitsvyu:292: mārgaṃ ca te darśayi agrabodhaye divyā manojñā madhurasvarāṃś ca saṃśrāvayiṣyanti ca nityakālam*
XXajitsvyu:293: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño 'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito
XXajitsvyu:295: atha rāja ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma |
XXajitsvyu:296: (Asv 121) atha tena bherīśabdena sametyāmātyagaṇas taṃ rājānam ajitasenam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:299: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt* |
XXajitsvyu:301: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutvā śīghram eva tad hastiratham aśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ
XXajitsvyu:302: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtamātreṇa rājājitaseno yena sodyānabhūmis tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
XXajitsvyu:303: sa ca nandimitramahāśrāvakas tenaivopasaṃkrānto rājānam ajitasenam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:304: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇas tava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi |
XXajitsvyu:305: atha rājā ajitaseno nandimitramahāśrāvakam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:308: yādṛśās tava mahārāja mahācittotpādaśraddhāprasādās tādṛśaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya |
XXajitsvyu:309: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhāmātyam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:314: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanāny ūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisaṃcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya |
XXajitsvyu:316: saptaratnamayaṃ (Asv 122) maṇimuktisaṃcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenas tenopasaṃkrānto rājānam ajitasenam evam āha
XXajitsvyu:317: | kṛtaṃ mahārāja mayā kuṭikaṃ yādṛśam ājñaptam* |
XXajitsvyu:319: tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe caṃkramaḥ kārayitavyaś caturyojanāni dīrgheṇa dve yojane vistāreṇa
XXajitsvyu:320: atha so 'mātyas taṃ caṃkramaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenas
XXajitsvyu:322: kṛtaṃ mayā caṃkramu suṣṭhu śobhanaṃ ājñā tvayā yat kṛtapūrvam eva ca /
XXajitsvyu:323: satvāna moceti prakṛtiṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vimocaye prāṇina sarvam etat* //
XXajitsvyu:324: aho sulabdhā praṇidhīkṛtaṃ tvayā vimocayī sarvajagat* sadevakam* /
XXajitsvyu:325: praṇidhiṃ kṛtaṃ yat tvayam īdṛśaṃ bhave dharmaṃ prakāśeti mi dharmabhāṇako //
XXajitsvyu:326: niṣaṇṇa sthitvā kuṭikā ca caṃkrame ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā /
XXajitsvyu:327: sa caṃkramaṃ caiva kṛtaṃ suśobhanaṃ maṇiratnasaṃcchādita taṃ sa bhūmim* //
XXajitsvyu:328: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
XXajitsvyu:329: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ pratinivṛtya tatraiva (Asv 123) kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisatvasamādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:330: anyena keśān anyena nayanāny anyena dantān anyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayam anyenodaram anyenorū anyena jaṅghe anyena pādau samāpanno 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:331: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣuṃ na paśyati |
XXajitsvyu:336: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:337: atha sa rājā ajitasenas taṃ bhikṣum ātmabhāvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajāto 'bhūt*
XXajitsvyu:338: saṃtrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭayan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putram evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:341: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāṃjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata |
XXajitsvyu:342: mā śokacittasya bhave nṛpendra mā vedayī vedanam īdṛśāni /
XXajitsvyu:343: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi rauravaṃ narakaṃ cāpi gamiṣyasi sudāruṇam* //
XXajitsvyu:346: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣair na bhūtair na ca rākṣasaiḥ /
XXajitsvyu:350: kalyāṇamitram ayaṃ āsī tava kāraṇam āgatam* /
XXajitsvyu:354: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim* /
XXajitsvyu:356: atha sa rājakumāras taṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:357: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ svakaṃ putram evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:358: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yad ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:360: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣur bodhisatvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṃgataḥ sarvasatvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham* |
XXajitsvyu:361: atha sa rājakumāro rājānam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:363: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhir dārakaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sa caṃkramas tenopasaṃkrāntau
XXajitsvyu:364: atha sa bhikṣus tataḥ samādher vyutthito rājānam ajitasenam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:365: āgaccha mahārāja kiṃ karoṣy asmin sthāne |
XXajitsvyu:367: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā maulipaṭṭaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti |
XXajitsvyu:374: na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam* |
XXajitsvyu:377: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ prāñjalir evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:379: mokṣāgamaṃ darśanu tubhyam ārṣāḥ sudurlabhaṃ karmaśatair acintiyaiḥ //
XXajitsvyu:380: ye darśanaṃ dāsyati tubhyam ārṣā muktā ca so bheṣyati kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
XXajitsvyu:381: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇute muhūrtam* //
XXajitsvyu:383: niṣadya yugye ratanāmaye śubhe vrajāmy ahaṃ yena sa rājadhānīm* /
XXajitsvyu:384: dadāmy ahaṃ bhojanu suprabhūtaṃ dadāmy ahaṃ kāśikavastram etat* /
XXajitsvyu:386: sūkṣmāṇi jālāni ca saṃhitāni yāṃ cīvarāṃ tubhya dadāmi adya //
XXajitsvyu:387: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXajitsvyu:389: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata |
XXajitsvyu:390: saṃtarpito bhojana suprabhūtaṃ mṛṣṭānnapānarasam uttamaṃ śubham* /
XXajitsvyu:391: ye bhikṣusaṃghāya dadaṃti dānaṃ te bodhimaṇḍena cireṇa gacchata //
XXajitsvyu:392: sudurlabhaṃ darśana nāyakasya na cireṇa so gacchati buddhakṣetram* /
XXajitsvyu:393: amitāyuṣasya varabuddhakṣetre sukhāvatīṃ gacchati śīghram etat* //
XXajitsvyu:394: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:395: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma |
XXajitsvyu:396: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvās tā amātyakoṭyo rājānam evam āhuḥ |
XXajitsvyu:399: saptame divase hastiratham aśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt* |
XXajitsvyu:400: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya (Asv 127) |
XXajitsvyu:401: athāmātyakoṭyas taṃ rājānam ajitasenam evam āhuḥ |
XXajitsvyu:402: kṛtam asmābhiḥ mahārāja hastiratham aśvarathaṃ sajjam* |
XXajitsvyu:403: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
XXajitsvyu:404: atha bhagavān rājānam ajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān sarvaśrāvakān āmantrayata
XXajitsvyu:406: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisatvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan* |
XXajitsvyu:407: atha rājā dūratas taṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:411: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati |
XXajitsvyu:412: te ca bodhisatvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisatvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ |
XXajitsvyu:413: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathād avatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
XXajitsvyu:414: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṃkramate sma |
XXajitsvyu:415: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṃgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ
XXajitsvyu:416: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānam utthāpayati sma |
XXajitsvyu:421: na me kadācid iha dṛṣṭarūpaṃ tvaṃ lokanātho varadakṣiṇīyo //
XXajitsvyu:423: dvātṛṃśatā lakṣaṇadhāriṇaṃ mune nāsau kadācid vrajate apāyabhūmim* /
XXajitsvyu:424: yo lokanāthasya hi rūpu paśye tvaṃ lokanāthā śirasā namasyāmī //
XXajitsvyu:425: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ bhagavantam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:427: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumansyajātaḥ |
XXajitsvyu:431: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi |
XXajitsvyu:432: atha rājā ajitasenas tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumansyajātas taṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣuṃ purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvān amātyān āmantrayate sma |
XXajitsvyu:433: sarvair grāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajāny ucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni (Asv 129)
XXajitsvyu:436: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajāny ucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni |
XXajitsvyu:437: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānām ucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ |
XXajitsvyu:439: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanānandapūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputrapramukhair mahāśrāvakasaṃghaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ ajitasenasya rājño rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
XXajitsvyu:440: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakiran bhagavantam evam āha |
XXajitsvyu:441: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisampadyante |
XXajitsvyu:445: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño 'jitasenasya dharmān
XXajitsvyu:447: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ |
XXajitsvyu:448: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti |
XXajitsvyu:451: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma |
XXajitsvyu:457: atha sa rājakumāro 'ntarīkṣagatas taṃ pitaraṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata |
XXajitsvyu:458: mā vilaṃba kurute tāta mā khedaṃ kiṃci yāsyasi /
XXajitsvyu:459: aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna darśanaṃ aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna lābham* //
XXajitsvyu:460: aho sulabdhaṃ paramaṃ hi lābhaṃ pravrajyalābhaṃ sugatena varṇitam* /
XXajitsvyu:461: saṃsāramokṣo sugatena varṇitaṃ pravrajya śīghraṃ ma vilaṃba tāta //
XXajitsvyu:462: mā khedayī lokavināyakendraṃ sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābhaṃ
XXajitsvyu:464: śīghraṃ ca pravrajya mayā hi labdhaṃ prāptaṃ mayā uttamam agrabodhim* /
XXajitsvyu:465: śrutvā na rājā tada putravākyaṃ sa pravrajī śāsani nāyakasya //
XXajitsvyu:466: atha rājakumāro 'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitva tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:467: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra (Asv 131) āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ [prīti]saumansyajāto bhagavantam uddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma |
XXajitsvyu:470: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt* |
XXajitsvyu:471: tāś cāmātyakoṭyo bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajitā abhūvan* |
XXajitsvyu:473: bhagavān rājānam ajitasenaṃ pravrājya yena jetavanaṃ vihāras tena gamanam
XXajitsvyu:476: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno rājyaṃ parityajya vihāraṃ kārayitvā bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt*
XXajitsvyu:479: sādhu sādhu ānanda yat tvayā parikīrtitam* |
XXajitsvyu:480: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati |
XXajitsvyu:481: anāgate 'dhvany aparimitaiḥ kalpair acintyair aparimāṇair ajitaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati
XXajitsvyu:482: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* |
XXajitsvyu:487: (Asv 132) ayam ānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakas tatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato
